A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The story outline was fine\, but the tone and the portrayal of characters was very bizarre. I was constantly taken out of the settings in the movie saying aloud\, did I really just see that or what is going on here. Felt like all of the established cannon was intentionally ignored or changed for shocks sake. Ive been a star wars fan for a long time\, but legit have no desire or excitement to see the next one. By the end of the movie I sat discussing with my family and realized that I was a 33 year old father embarrassed to be carrying a lightsaber in public\, which I doubt is what a movie (especially Star Wars) is supposed to leave you feeling.
